content.question: Fekru knows that when his teacher pours water from a small, wide glass into a tall, thin glass, the amount of water remains the same even though the tall, thin glass looks like it has more water. Which of the following theories best explains Fekru’s ability?

choices.label: Lev Vygotsky’s theory of zone of proximal development
B. F. Skinner’s theory of operant conditioning
Albert Bandura’s theory of social learning

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
